title: Phencyclidine
summary: Phencyclidine or phenylcyclohexyl piperidine (PCP), also known as angel dust among other names, is a dissociative hallucinogenic drug used for its mind-altering effects.[1][5] PCP may cause hallucinations, distorted perceptions of sounds, and violent behavior.[5][8][9] As a recreational drug, it is typically smoked, but may be taken by mouth, snorted, or injected.[5][6][8] It may also be mixed with cannabis or tobacco.[1][5]
